Description: Unique customer identifier
Male or Female
1 if the customer is a senior citizen, 0 otherwise
Customer has a partner: Yes or No
Customer has dependents: Yes or No
Number of months the customer has stayed with the company
Customer has phone service: Yes or No
Customer has multiple phone lines: Yes, No, or 'No phone service'
Type of internet connection: DSL, Fiber optic, or No
Online security add-on: Yes, No, or 'No internet service'
Online backup add-on: Yes, No, or 'No internet service'
Device protection add-on: Yes, No, or 'No internet service'
Tech support add-on: Yes, No, or 'No internet service'
Streaming TV add-on: Yes, No, or 'No internet service'
Streaming movies add-on: Yes, No, or 'No internet service'
Contract term: Month-to-month, One year, or Two year
Billing is paperless: Yes or No
Payment method: Electronic check, Mailed check, Bank transfer (automatic), or Credit card (automatic)
Current monthly charge amount
Total amount charged to date (may contain blanks that must be coerced to numeric during cleaning)
Target label: Yes if the customer left during the target window; No otherwise
